about_the_game:
immerse yourself in a captivating and thought-provoking experience like no other. Prepare to witness Jesus in a way you've never imagined before. As Jesus awakens, the weight of the world rests upon his divine shoulders, and the power to shape his path lies in your hands.

Embark on a journey filled with moral dilemmas,revenge and righteousness stand at odds.


Will you succumb to the desire for vengeance, or choose the path of benevolence and compassion? The choice is yours to make, and the consequences will ripple throughout the immersive storyline.

Unleash your wrath upon formidable opponents, armed with an array of weapons handpicked for your divine mission. For those who prefer a more celestial touch, harness the elemental forces of fire, ice, or electricity, allowing Jesus to rain down divine judgment upon those who oppose him.


Explore vividly rendered locations, including the opulent palace of Pontius Pilate, where political intrigue and power play a dangerous game. Face the Roman army led by the notorious Caiaphas, who seeks to protect his authority at any cost. Venture into the depths of a prison, a place of torment where Jesus once suffered, bringing the stark reality of his sacrifice to life.

As you navigate this richly detailed world, contemplate forgiveness and grapple with the boundaries of mercy. Will you choose to extend absolution to your enemies or unleash the full force of your fury? The weight of these decisions will shape the destiny of Jesus and the fate of those around him.

Prepare for a truly immersive experience that seamlessly blends intense action with moments of tranquility. Delve into the depths of your own soul and discover the limits of your own morality as you guide Jesus through this epic journey.

"Jesus Uncrossed" is not just a game; it is an exploration of the human spirit, a testament to the power of choice, and a reminder of the enduring lessons from the life of Jesus Christ. Embark on this remarkable adventure and discover a narrative that challenges your preconceptions, stirs your emotions, and leaves an indelible mark on your gaming experience.



Gameplay & Feature :
  • Jesus has multiple weapons : Pistol, Shotgun, Rifle, Smg - slay your ennemies with it in a third person style view.
  • Jesus has magic spell, fire, electricity, ice with multiple style (Single shot, Cone, AOE) to slay his enemies or incapacitate them.
  • Your choices (forgive or attack) will impact your story and your ending. You can forgive or get your revenge.
  • Story driven adventure with voices character & with puzzles and choices.
  • Travel in multiple area, Cave, Desert, Bazar, Temples, Roman & Eastern palaces...
  • Encounter many enemies (Romans, Eastern... ) with different weapon styles, 1 handed blades, 2 handed, spears, dual blades. But also spiders, snakes...
  • Gore fights with blood & dismemberments.

content_descriptors.notes:
If you use letal weapons you maybe dismember the ennemies. 
If you use ice magic more than 3 time, the body explodes.
If you use fire, the enemy is burned

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or better/ AMD R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Make choices as Jesus, awaken to a new reality. Unleash divine powers of fire, ice, or electricity. Encounter Pontius Pilate, Caiaphas, and a torturous prison. Will forgiveness prevail or fury reign? Explore a story you never imagined. Choose your weapons and shape your destiny.
